column20: Charged Attack: Perform up to 5 rapid strikes.
column21: Plunging Attack: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.
column167: Hold: You disgorge a meteorite from the depths of the earth, dealing AoE Geo DMG. The meteorite is considered a Geo Construct, and can be climbed or used to block attacks.
column281: Shattered Darkrock: Reduces Starfell Sword's CD by 2s.
column282: Frenzied Rockslide: The final hit of a Normal Attack combo triggers a collapse, dealing 60% of ATK as AoE Geo DMG.
column283: Invincible Stonewall: Party members within the radius of Wake of Earth have their CRIT Rate increased by 10% and have increased resistance against interruption.
column284: Rockcore Meltdown: When the meteorite created by Starfell Sword is destroyed, it will also explode, dealing additional AoE Geo DMG equal to the amount of damage dealt by Starfell Sword.
column285: Will of the Rock: Increases the Level of Wake of Earth by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.
column286: Reaction Force: The shockwave triggered by Wake of Earth regenerates 5 Energy for every opponent hit. A maximum of 25 Energy can be regenerated in this manner at any one time.
column287: Meteorite Impact: Increases the Level of Starfell Sword by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.
column288: Everlasting Boulder: The barrier created by Wake of Earth lasts 5s longer. The meteorite created by Starfell Sword lasts 10s longer.
